app.title: RAG Demo Chatbot
app.subtitle: AI Engineer Portfolio Project
app.description: Upload documents or web content, then ask questions about them using AI-powered semantic search.

messages.readyToChat: Ready to chat! Ask your question.
messages.cannotAnswer: I cannot answer this question based on the uploaded documents.
messages.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
messages.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
messages.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave this session?

customPrompt.label: Custom Prompt Template
customPrompt.placeholder: Leave empty to use default prompt, or enter your custom prompt template here...

threshold.label: Similarity Threshold
threshold.description: Controls how strict the RAG system is. Higher values provide more precise but potentially fewer answers, lower values provide more but potentially less relevant answers.
threshold.rec_lenient: Suitable for exploratory queries, may include more irrelevant content
threshold.rec_balanced: Recommended setting, balances precision and recall
threshold.rec_strict: Only answers highly relevant questions, may often return cannot answer

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.subtitle: Upload a PDF, text file, or provide a URL to get started

dropzone.dragOrClick: Drag & drop a file here, or click to browse

url.label: Provide a URL
url.hint: We will extract text content from the URL

error.invalidFileType: Only PDF and TXT files are supported
error.invalidUrl: Invalid URL format. Must be http:// or https://

crawler.title: Website Crawler
crawler.description: Enter a website URL to automatically crawl and extract content
crawler.urlNote: {{count}} URLs crawled and ready for processing

processing.title: Processing Document
processing.pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a few moments...

empty.hint: Start by typing a question about the uploaded document

input.placeholder: Ask a question about the document...
input.placeholder_new: Welcome to discuss topics related to uploaded data
input.hint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

messages.cannotAnswer: I cannot answer this question based on the uploaded documents.

metrics.title: üìä Real-time Metrics
metrics.tokenWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Token usage is above 80%. Consider starting a new session.

leave.title: Leave Session
leave.message: Are you sure you want to leave? All session data will be deleted permanently.

restart.title: Restart Session
restart.message: Are you sure you want to restart? Your current session will be closed and a new session will be created.

step2.title: AI Behavior & Response Configuration
step2.subtitle: Configure AI behavior, response policy, and runtime constraints
step2.disabledNotice: Data has been uploaded. Configuration is locked and cannot be modified.

system.title: System Rules
system.strictRagOn: ON: AI will refuse to answer when data is insufficient
system.strictRagOff: OFF: AI may supplement with general knowledge
system.inferenceOn: ON: May make reasonable inferences within document scope
system.inferenceOff: OFF: Only answers explicitly stated in documents
system.noDataPolicyDesc: When no relevant data is found, AI will clearly inform the user and suggest possible alternative questions.

session.expiredMessage: Session expired after 10 minutes of inactivity. Data has been cleared, returning to the initial screen.
session.reloadMessage: The page was reloaded. Your session has been reset.
session.restartMessage: You clicked 'Start Over'. Your session has been reset.
